subject: Move outer frame below global padding in Spacing section
body:
Reorganized Spacing section for better UX:
- Global padding slider at top
- Outer frame controls right below (both are global settings)
- Per-cell settings section with cell selector
- Cell padding and cell frame controls together when cell selected
- Overview shows both custom padding and frame indicators

https://claude.ai/code/session_01AQxUcta7zmziDFsrmzzuTm
title: Move outer frame below global padding in Spacing section
